scripts.build: echo 'Root build script - use build-all instead' && exit 1
scripts.build-all: npm run build:portfolio && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:portfolio
scripts.build:portfolio: cd portfolio && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --no-audit --no-fund && (cd .. && npm run check-build)
scripts.check-build: cd portfolio && CI=false DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --no-audit --no-fund && npm run build
